name: Wor' Triumph
description: A simple game of words and mind How to Play? • You will be given a clue. Like,  "Antonym of behind" • For this, you will have an incomplete word given...   • Press the key on the keyboard of the letter you wish to put in, then click on the gap where you want it to be. • If your answer is right, then the second word will unlock. •   Derive at the answer from the previously found word, in this case "ahead". Rearrange the words in a manner to get the appropriate answer. Here, it is .... The answer "head" could be derived from the previous word "ahead" by unscrambling it. ✨👍 Now, go ahead and play.... Thank you.
